text:
I've been here to this shop about three times. First time was in 27th December 2024, was not open and phone was not reachable. Second time in January 11th 2025. Third time today which is 10th of April and it always seems to be closed. No WhatsApp replies, No phone calls. I think this shop owner opens when he wants or it is closed. I wouldn't know which one as I can't get anyone from there.

It's a shame because this is the closest workshop to medini where I stay. If you plan on coming here please try to find another shop that is open
